fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
We are interested in delivering employment, disability and health support services and therefore we would like to participate in employment and youth employment initiatives as well as health and regional policies. 
 
Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files currently followed by our organisation: 
- integration of long-term unemployed into the labour market 
- support for unemployed youth, including those Not in Education, Employment or Training (NEETs) 
- policies and activities related to health  
- child support services
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: In United Kingdom MAXIMUS is a member of the Employment Related Services Association (ERSA), a representative body for the employment support sector. (http://ersa.org.uk) & the Business Services Association (BSA), a policy and research organisation. It brings together all those who are interested in delivering efficient, flexible and cost-effective service and infrastructure projects across the private and public sectors.(http://www.bsa-org.com
goals__remit:
MAXIMUS is a global company working in a range of health, employment  and child support services. By working exclusively with Governments we are driven by a mission to strengthen communities and improve the lives of those we help.  
Our capabilities in employment support services include welfare-to-work programmes including payment by results schemes consisting of: 
- Job search & placement; In-work support; 
- Skills assessment & jobs training 
- Benefits & eligibility advocacy 
Our Health services include:  
- Occupational Health assessment 
- Occupational Health support  
- Health promotion and wellbeing screening services 
- Sickness absence referrals
relevant_communication:
MAXIMUS will: 
- Engage with stakeholders in national governments, as well as stakeholders at the regional and local level  
- Undertake PR and communication activities  
- Publish white papers, best practices, advice
